Title: Crocodile Dundee II
Writer: Paul Hogan (characters), Paul Hogan, Brett Hogan
Actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, Ernie Dingo
Plot: Mick and Sue continue where they left off in "'Crocodile' Dundee". New York City drug lords are pursuing Sue for having solid evidence against them for murder, so for her safety, Mick takes her back to Australia. When the gangsters follow them, Mick demonstrates his outback skills once more.
